brief_summary.textblock:
This study is a RCT of transcranial electrical stimulation in depressed patients. Mood,
      cognitive test performance and biomarkers will be measured during the trial.

clinical_study.brief_title: Transcranial Electrical Stimulation (TES) for the Treatment of Depression.

facility.name: Black Dog Institute / University of New South Wales

authority: Australia: UNSW Human Research Ethics Committee
Australia: Department of Health and Ageing Therapeutic Goods Administration

primary_outcome.measure: Montgomery Asberg Depression Rating Scale for Depression (MADRS)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The University of New South Wales

clinical_study.source: The University of New South Wales

lead_sponsor.agency: The University of New South Wales

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
